item.title: Hugo
item.description: What is Hugo? Hugo is a fast and simple framework written in Go language to build general purpose websites. There are a lot of pre-buit themes you can choose from and tweak as you go on. A general idea of how Hugo works Create a new site using#+BEGIN_SRC shell hugo new site <site_name> . Clone a theme repository/copy theme files into the site_name/themes} folder and add src_toml{theme = <theme_name>} into src_shell{site_name/config.
